page.title: 15STORNOWAY SOUTH: THE COUNCIL
page.content: The{Western Isles Islands Council}has 30 councillors, each representing a ward. There are 66 committees and sub- committees with some councillors on each. About 300 employees work in the building in 8 seperate departments: Education, Planning & Development, Consumer Protection & Environmental Health, Engineering, Finance, Housing and Social Work. The building was opened in{1979}by the {Queen,}and many famous people have been there since as you will see if you look in the visitors' book. The Employees work flexi-time and there are about 1300 throughout the islands. The{Gaelic}name for the Council is {Comhairle nan Eilean.}The estimated gross revenue expenditure for 1985-86 is Â£40,071,000. 37% to Education, 22% toHousing and 15% for Transportation.
